email_content:
Dear Alumni,

I hope you are doing well. I’m excited to share a brief snapshot of the newest applicant class to the University of Excellence:

• Interest continues to grow, with roughly five thousand applications submitted for the upcoming academic year.
• Academic caliber remains strong, with average standardized test scores in the low-1400s (SAT) and low-30s (ACT).
• Our reach is increasingly global, as candidates hail from more than one hundred countries across every continent.

Beyond the numbers, the applications highlight remarkable stories of resilience, creativity, and a deep commitment to community impact—qualities that align perfectly with our institution’s values. We look forward to welcoming another outstanding cohort and will keep you posted as the admissions season progresses.

Thank you for your ongoing support, which helps attract and nurture the next generation of Excellence scholars.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
Office of Admissions
